sections.heading: treatment, defined.Primary treatment shall mean inpatient treatment rendered in a structured and scheduled setting to prevent further ingestion of alcoholic beverages, to relieve the pain of the withdrawal syndrome, and to provide intensive therapy or rehabilitation, when such treatment is rendered
sections.text: treatment, defined.Primary treatment shall mean inpatient treatment rendered in a structured and scheduled setting to prevent further ingestion of alcoholic beverages, to relieve the pain of the withdrawal syndrome, and to provide intensive therapy or rehabilitation, when such treatment is rendered in a hospital or a substance abuse treatment center which is certified or accredited to render such care.SourceLaws 1980, LB 646, ยง 8;Laws 1996, LB 1155, ยง 19.
